entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 03:30 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
